recipes.title: Garden Fresh Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad made with ingredients straight from our garden.
steps: Harvest fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and herbs from the garden.
Wash all vegetables thoroughly.
Chop the lettuce, slice the tomatoes and cucumbers.
In a large bowl, combine the chopped vegetables.
Add chopped fresh herbs like basil and parsley.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Toss the salad gently to combine all ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately and enjoy your garden-fresh salad!

recipes.title: Herb-Roasted Vegetables
recipes.description: A delicious medley of roasted vegetables seasoned with garden-fresh herbs.
steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Harvest a variety of vegetables from the garden (e.g., carrots, bell peppers, zucchini, onions).
Wash and chop the vegetables into similar-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, toss the vegetables with olive oil.
Pick fresh herbs like rosemary, thyme, and sage from the garden.
Chop the herbs and add them to the vegetables.
Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: A comforting soup made with ripe tomatoes and fragrant basil from our garden.
steps: Pick ripe tomatoes and fresh basil from the garden.
Wash the tomatoes and roughly chop them.
In a large pot, sauté chopped onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add the chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in chopped fresh basil leaves.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, garnished with additional basil leaves.
